/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the sun. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and architectural diversity.
